snippet.title: Work this way: Using a treadmill desk can lead to better health and greater productivity
snippet.description: After using a treadmill desk for two months, Alex Howard is seeing positive changes. Read about the reported health and productivity benefits that are motivating some workers to wa...

snippet.title: My Chromecast experiment, with a nod to Dracula
snippet.description: Google Chromecast is a device that can allow you to stream certain multimedia content to your TV. Read about some challenges setting it up and suggestions to make it work.

snippet.title: 10 things I DON'T miss about old technology
snippet.description: The good old days of 1980s technology weren't always good. Read about 10 things few (if any) people will miss about that era.

snippet.title: IT project management terms you should know
snippet.description: This glossary will help your IT project teams standardize on frequently used project management terms, from critical path to work breakdown structure to scrum.

snippet.title: Get Office 365 and SharePoint access with the harmon.ie Android app
snippet.description: The company harmon.ie brings their leading SharePoint mobile client app to Android. Will Kelly gives us his first impressions of the app.

snippet.title: Manage IT projects and your SMB using Viewpath
snippet.description: If your SMB is looking for a SaaS-based project management solution, find out why you should consider trying Viewpath.

snippet.title: Tell your brand's story on social media by appealing to the personal
snippet.description: Social media gives customers a direct and easy way to express their every thought about your brand. Read tips on interacting with and responding to that feedback in ways that stren...

snippet.title: Review: SiSoftware Sandra 2013 performance testing suite
snippet.description: SiSoftware Sandra 2013 is a single tool that can bring every benchmark and testing routine under the same roof.

snippet.title: You have choices in the aftermath of Google Reader's demise
snippet.description: Google Reader is being retired this summer. Find out how this affects businesses and consumers using RSS feeds, and explore some alternatives.

snippet.title: Take advantage of the $15 Windows 8 Pro Upgrade Offer
snippet.description: Greg Shultz shows us all of the steps involved in using the $15 upgrade offer to download Windows 8 Pro and burn it to a DVD.
